verses.text: \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* prayed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w belly|strong="H4578"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* said: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* cried out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* distress, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* answered me; out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol \w I|strong="H3068"\w* cried aloud, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6419"\w* heard \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* into \w the|strong="H8085"\w* deep, into \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* great flood rolled \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*; \w all|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* breakers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* waves \w passed|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w driven|strong="H5437"\w* \w out|strong="H7993"\w*, \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* sight; How \w will|strong="H3824"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5674"\w* \w again|strong="H5674"\w* look towards \w your|strong="H3605"\w* holy temple?

\w The|strong="H3254"\w* waters surrounded \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, \w the|strong="H3254"\w* great deep engulfed \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, \w the|strong="H3254"\w* sea weeds \w were|strong="H5869"\w* wrapped \w about|strong="H5027"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* head.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H5437"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* roots \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* mountains; \w the|strong="H5704"\w* prison \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth closed \w over|strong="H7218"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w forever|strong="H5704"\w*. \w Yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w brought|strong="H5437"\w* \w up|strong="H2280"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* destruction, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* God.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* slipped \w away|strong="H5927"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* remembered \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w reached|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H3381"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* holy temple.
\w Those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* worship worthless idols abandon \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w but|strong="H5800"\w* I \w will|strong="H2617"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w you|strong="H5800"\w* with loud thanksgiving! I \w will|strong="H2617"\w* \w pay|strong="H8104"\w* \w that|strong="H7723"\w* \w which|strong="H2617"\w* I \w have|strong="H8104"\w* vowed. Salvation \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H2617"\+w*\nd*â€™s.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spoke \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fish, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7999"\w* threw up Jonah upon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dry land.
